summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackClarins Total Eye Revive Eye Cream is a cream-gel eye treatment that visibly reduces fine lines, dark circles and signs of stress and fatigue to instantly revive tired-looking eyes.
details: DetailsBenefitsVisibly smoothes fine linesDiminishes the look of dark circles and puffinessRevives the eye areaSuitable for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearersKey IngredientsTeasel and Myrothamnus extracts help prevent and visibly diminish the first signs of agingHorse Chestnut escin and plant-based Caffeine visibly reduce the look of dark circlesOrganic Oat sugars help smooth the eye area to provide an instant reviving effectResearch Results89% Eye contour is hydrated*81% Undereye puffiness is visibly reduced***Satisfaction test - 100 women - immediately after application**Satisfaction test - 92 women - 7 days of use.Item 2632367How To UseUse daily, morning and/or evening.Fingertip apply to lower and upper eyelids, starting from the inner corners and working outward. Gently press for a draining effect.Go over the same area with the ultra-cold metal applicator tip, pressing lightly to help de-puff.Finish by applying gentle circular pressure to temples.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Dimethicone, Propanediol, Betaine, Ppg-5-Ceteth-20, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Glycerin, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltau- Rate/Vp Copolymer, Cellulose, Caffeine, Glyceryl Capry- Late, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Dipsacus Sylvestris Extract, Hydro- Xyacetophenone, CI 77891/Titanium Dioxide, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Tocopheryl Acetate, Disodium Edta, Ave- Na Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract, Escin, Parfum/Fragrance, Butylene Glycol, Marrubium Vulgare Extract, Myrotham- Nus Flabellifolia Leaf/Stem Extract, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Benzoate, Phenethyl Alcohol, Furcellaria Lumbri- Calis Extract, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Ascorbic Acid, Lactic Acid/Glycolic Acid Copolymer, Lapsana Communis Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Maris Sal/Sea Salt/Sel Marin, Heptapeptide-15 Palmitate, Polyvinyl Alcohol, Copper Palmi- Toyl Heptapeptide-14 [V3933A].Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use daily, morning and/or evening.Fingertip apply to lower and upper eyelids, starting from the inner corners and working outward. Gently press for a draining effect.Go over the same area with the ultra-cold metal applicator tip, pressing lightly to help de-puff.Finish by applying gentle circular pressure to temples.

reviews.headline: Its not bad
reviews.comments: I like it, especially the metal applicator for depuffing but the downfall is that it peels terribly. Its also super drying. I cant wear it under makeup . It will ruin my makeup. Id prefer something else sorrry :/

reviews.headline: Best for Bags and Dark Circles
reviews.comments: This eye cream is the best at targeting under eye "bags" and dark circles. I have tried many brands at many different price points… with this product, after 9 months of consistent use - my bags and circles are basically non-existent. I love the cooling applicator - it feels so good and I get a quick lymphatic massage which I feel has been a game changer for my under eye area. If you struggle with "bags" and dark circles, I highly recommend this product. For reference, I'm 45 with fair skin.

reviews.headline: Spend your money on other Clarins products, this one is Meh
reviews.comments: I love clarins products , so I was surprised to not be in love with this one. The packaging makes it so hard to take the cap off and put back on — the only thing about it is the metal applicator. Secondly, I feel that this under eye treatment is surprisingly drying? It doesn't leave my skin feeling moisturized. Additionally, I have noticed zero improvement in my under eyes (dark circles , etc). The claims of the product just aren't there. It's for sure not worth the money, but their orher stuff is!!

reviews.headline: Not worth it try Caudalie instead
reviews.comments: I was excited about this product, but it caused dryness and made my under eye flaky with any concealer I used. The packaging was annoying to deal with because of the top. The only great thing about the product is the metal cooling tip.

reviews.headline: Not worth it try Caudalie instead
reviews.comments: I was excited about this product, but it caused dryness and made my under eye flaky with any concealer I used. The packaging was annoying to deal with because of the top. The only great thing about the product is the metal cooling tip.

reviews.headline: Hello
reviews.comments: I'm in love with this product have been using it for about a month, I use it morning and night I can really tell a difference

reviews.headline: Very drying
reviews.comments:
This dries my under eye area out and makes my concealer flaky more than anything. Initial application feels good when used with the metal tip but is not hydrating at all, still have dark circles after using twice a day,
Especially for the cost it's not worth it. So much better out there. Will be returning .
